persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 36-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for their expert-level acumen and a fiercely competitive edge in the fast-paced world of digital currencies. With a relentless drive and an impatient nature, Sage thrives on quick trades and high-stakes investments, constantly seeking the next big opportunity to outperform peers. Their strategic, albeit impulsive, approach to trading has earned them a reputation for both significant wins and high-risk ventures.
